Title: XamlToon
Description: a MS-Public License re-implementation of the wintoon api's with full frame based bitmap animation and tweening for WPF and Silverlight. Making "classic" Disney style frame-by-frame animation possible again..
HomeWiki: XAMLToon is a MS-Public License re-implementation of the ideas behind Microsoft's Classic Wintoon api's with full frame based bitmap animation and tweening for .NET. Making "classic" Disney style frame-by-frame animation possible again..
TagList: Expression Blend,Animation,Cel Animator,Multiplane Camera,ToonElement,Design Surface addin,FLC,IFF,ANIM,Flash,Expression Encoder,XAML,WPF,WPF 3D,Silverlight 3,MOV,WMV,AVI,Tweening,
